name: Ping-pong-pygame
tagline: This is a classic Arcade game I created using Python.
body:
### Ping Pong Pygame
A Demo for a Two Player Arcade Game like a Ping Pong Game.
Player One controller: (a = up z = down)
Player Two Controller: (arrow up = up/arrow down = down)
P = Pause the Game 
R = Resume the Game
S = Serve the Ball
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
